mapper.select: select s.productId,s.amount,t.storeName,d.productName,d.realCostPrice,d.paidAmount,y.minamount,y.maxCapacityAmount,u.useName from stock s,s_gather_details d,storehouse t,safetystock y,product_use u where s.productId=d.productId and s.sid=t.sid and d.sid=y.sid and d.productId=y.productId and t.use_type=u.id and s.checkTag='已审核'

insert.foreach: update stock set amount=amount+#{herDetailst.paidAmount},checkMan='孙陆泉',checkTime=now(),checkTag='已审核' where productId=#{herDetailst.productId} and sid=#{herDetailst.sid}
